A time traveler accidentally gets stuck in the past and must find a way to return to the present before they are trapped forever.
A person experiences a strange occurrence where they can see the future but can't do anything to change it.
A group of strangers find themselves stranded on a deserted island with no memory of how they got there.
A person discovers that they have a unique ability to manipulate time, but it comes with dangerous consequences.
A person becomes obsessed with the idea offate and spends their life trying to uncover the secrets of the universe.
